data.title: How many Englishmen have played James Bond?
data.meta_description: Barry Nelson (1954 Television Movie of Casino Royale)Sean Connery (seven films)David Niven (1967 spoof movie Casino Royale)George Lazenby (one film)Roger Moore (seven films)Timothy Dalton (two films)Pierce Brosnan (four films)Daniel Craig (three films)---Official Bond films:*includes actor in order of production and the number of movies they did*Sean Connery (6)George Lazenby (1)Roger Moore (7)Timothy Dalton (2)Pierce Brosnan (4)Daniel Craig (3)Official Bond films featuring Sean Connery:"Dr. No", "From Russia With Love", "Goldfinger," "Thunderball," "You Only Live Twice" and "Diamonds Are Forever."Official Bond films featuring George Lazenby:"On Her Majesty's Secret Service."Official Bond films featuring Roger Moore:"Live and Let Die," "The Man With The Golden Gun," "The Spy Who Loved Me," "Moonraker," "For Your Eyes Only," "Octopussy" and "A View to a Kill."Official Bond films featuring Timothy Dalton:"The Living Daylights" and "Licence To Kill."Official Bond films featuring Pierce Brosnan:"Goldeneye," "Tomorrow Never Dies," "The World Is Not Enough" and "Die Another Day."Official Bond films featuring Daniel Craig:"Casino Royale," "Quantum Of Solace" and "Skyfall"Un-Official Bond filmsDavid Niven (1)Sean Connery (1)Un-Official Bond films featuring Sean Connery:"Never Say Never Again."Un-Official Bond films featuring David Niven:"Casino Royale 1966."
data.text:
Barry Nelson (1954 Television Movie of Casino Royale)

Sean Connery (seven films)

David Niven (1967 spoof movie Casino Royale)

George Lazenby (one film)

Roger Moore (seven films)

Timothy Dalton (two films)

Pierce Brosnan (four films)

Daniel Craig (three films)

---

Official Bond films:

*includes actor in order of production and the number of movies they did*

Sean Connery (6)

George Lazenby (1)

Roger Moore (7)

Timothy Dalton (2)

Pierce Brosnan (4)

Daniel Craig (3)

Official Bond films featuring Sean Connery:

"Dr. No", "From Russia With Love", "Goldfinger," "Thunderball," "You Only Live Twice" and "Diamonds Are Forever."

Official Bond films featuring George Lazenby:

"On Her Majesty's Secret Service."

Official Bond films featuring Roger Moore:

"Live and Let Die," "The Man With The Golden Gun," "The Spy Who Loved Me," "Moonraker," "For Your Eyes Only," "Octopussy" and "A View to a Kill."

Official Bond films featuring Timothy Dalton:

"The Living Daylights" and "Licence To Kill."

Official Bond films featuring Pierce Brosnan:

"Goldeneye," "Tomorrow Never Dies," "The World Is Not Enough" and "Die Another Day."

Official Bond films featuring Daniel Craig:

"Casino Royale," "Quantum Of Solace" and "Skyfall"

Un-Official Bond films

David Niven (1)

Sean Connery (1)

Un-Official Bond films featuring Sean Connery:

"Never Say Never Again."

Un-Official Bond films featuring David Niven:

"Casino Royale 1966."
